item.title: Tesla Registrations Surge In Norway Despite Europe-Wide Weakness: Report
item.description: Tesla registrations soared 89% year-on-year in Norway in December, while declining 66% and 71% in France and Sweden, respectively.

item.description: Pi Network’s PI token underperformed the broader crypto rally despite gains across major altcoins.
